sourcesContent: import { useNavigate, useNavigation, useActionData } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Form } from 'react-router-dom'; import classes from './EventForm.module.css'; function EventForm({ method, event }) { const data = useActionData(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const navigation = useNavigation(); const isSubmitting = navigation.state === 'submitting'; function cancelHandler() { navigate('..'); } return (
